content.question: Two charged particles, one of charge <math alttext="positive e" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>+</mo><mi>e</mi></mpadded></math> and the other of charge <math alttext="positive 8 e" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>e</mi></mpadded></math> are placed along the <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi></math>-axis, as shown in the figure. Which of the following is most nearly the magnitude of the electric field at <math alttext="x equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math> from the two charged particles?

choices.label: <math alttext="1.3 times 10 to the negative 9 power, newton per coulomb" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>1.3</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>N/C</mtext></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="1.4 times 10 to the negative 9 power, newton per coulomb" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>1.4</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>N/C</mtext></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="4.3 times 10 to the negative 9 power, newton per coulomb" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>4.3</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>N/C</mtext></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="7.2 times 10 to the negative 9 power, newton per coulomb" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>7.2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>N/C</mtext></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="1.4 times 10 to the negative 9 power, newton per coulomb" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>1.4</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>N/C</mtext></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
